Maturd.. You fucking asshole.. you dont know shit. Some movies are not shot in 16:9. You wont get a 16:9 ratio of this movie.. even if u buy a BD.. It depends upon the choiceof camera lens by the director..  And plz stop fighting and tell about the quality ??

1080p means that the picture is 1920 wide, the height depends on the aspect ratio. The same is true for 720p, it is 1280 wide and the height depends on aspect ratio. Most movies are not shot in 1.78:1, which means there will be black bars. A 2.35:1 ratio results in approximately 1920x816 picture. Got it?
